column1: mrs. julie kay hull (schaafsma)| mrs. julie kay hull (schaafsma) age 48 of grand rapids went to be with the lord tuesday june 9, 2015. she will be missed by her husband james
column2: her children: dano joel and aubrea kirstan schaafsma
column3: her beloved granddaughter chiya kay schaafsma
column4: her parents don and joyce schaafsma
column5: siblings: dan, david and patti schaafsma
column6: other relatives and friends. she was preceded in death by her twin brother joel edward schaafsma and her brother donald wayne schaafsma. her family will receive visitors saturday from 1:00 to 5:00 pm at the arsulowicz brothers mortuary, 585 stocking ave nw. memorial contributions to national fibromyalga and chronic pain association care of the family or direct to funeral home.
